title: Forbidden Idol and Orianna question
body:
Hey guys/riot, I was wondering how the changes to Forbidden Idol effect Orianna's E(Command: Protect).

"Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for 4 seconds from the next 80/120/160/200/240 (+40% Ability Power) damage.
Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for 75% of the shield value: 60/90/120/150/180 (+30% Ability Power)."

So just for a random scenario, Orianna has 0 AP, and has a Forbidden Idol with a rank 1 E, she would shield for 88 points of damage, which is well and good, but that part that stumps me is, the second part of the active, "Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for 75% of the shield value" Would this be 60 points of damage or 66 points of damage, due to the shield buff? 

I doubting it would be 66 as I don't believe that Orianna's E was made with the consideration of a some sort of shield buff outside of scaling AP. Would love some more insight into this and other peoples opinion regarding this!
